snippet: Jim Tressel, the former football coach at Ohio State University, is now the vice president of strategic engagement at the University of Akron.
abstract: Jim Tressel, the former football coach at Ohio State University, is now the vice president of strategic engagement at the University of Akron.

headline.main: Tressel Returns to Ohio, Reunites With Akron
headline.print_headline: Akron Hires Tressel For Non-Athletic Post
